tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE choreography_details (
    routine_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    dance_routine TEXT,
    counts INTEGER,
    formation TEXT,
    music_cue TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE choreography_details (
  choreography_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  dance_routine TEXT NOT NULL,
  counts INT,
  formations TEXT,
  music_cues TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE counts (
    count_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    routine_id INT,
    beat_count INT,
    formation VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (routine_id) REFERENCES dance_routines(routine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE music_cues (
    cue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    routine_id INT,
    cue_time TIMESTAMP,
    cue_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (routine_id) REFERENCES dance_routines(routine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dance_routines (
   routine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   routine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   choreographer VARCHAR(50),
   music_cues TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE counts (
   count_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   count_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   beat_count INT,
   tempo INT
)

CREATE TABLE formations (
   formation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   formation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   number_of_dancers INT,
   formation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE music_cues (
   cue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   cue_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   cue_type VARCHAR(50),
   cue_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DanceRoutines (
	dance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	routine_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	counts INT NOT NULL,
	formation VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	music_cues TEXT
);
